name: Sleepspace
description:
If you have performance or audio issues try the Windows Build at the bottom of the page

Sleepspace is a card-based tactics game about overcoming your nightmares and trying to get a good night's sleep.

Sleepily assembled over 2 weeks for the August 2022 PIG Squad Summer Slow Jam

Controls

  • Select Cards - Left Mouse Button
  • De-Select Cards - Right Mouse Button (Click)
  • Pan Camera - WASD / Arrow Keys / Right Mouse Button (Hold)
  • Zoom - Mouse Wheel
  • Pause - Esc / M

Team

  • @lzklein - Sound Designer, Composer
  • @bordenary - 3D Artist
  • @ZRubyWorks - 3D Artist
  • @JaidenG123 - Engineer, Gameplay Designer
  • @BMMader - Engineer
  • @BrandnGarcia - Producer, VFX Artist
